meanings.sent1: She experienced intermenstrual bleeding, which was unexpected.
meanings.sent2: The doctor explained that intermenstrual spotting can sometimes be normal.
meanings.sent3: Her intermenstrual surprise made her laugh at the timing.
meanings.sent4: The intermenstrual pause in her cycle felt like a brief respite.
meanings.sent5: The intermenstrual break in her routine was a welcome change.

meanings.definition: Relating to the time between menstrual periods.
meanings.sent1: The intermenstrual symptoms she felt were concerning.
meanings.sent2: Keeping track of intermenstrual changes can help monitor health.
meanings.sent3: His intermenstrual mix-up of dates caused confusion.
meanings.sent4: The intermenstrual gap seemed to stretch longer than usual.
meanings.sent5: The intermenstrual period was a time of waiting and anticipation.
